content.rendered: Ehirim pro athletic socks are designed to provide compression and comfort. It works by applying pressure to specific areas of your feet and this aids blood flow and muscle recovery. Our athletic socks also help keep your ankle in place, thus reducing the risk of ankle sprain and it is made up of a unique blend of 46% nylon, 35% polyester, 13% cotton, and 6% elastane. Nylon and polyester give our socks it’s sweat-wicking and quick dry properties while elastane ensures that it is stretchy and flexible.
